content.description: A model of a process involving nucleic acids is shown in Figure 1.
content.question: Figure 1. Model of a process involving nucleic acids Which of the following best explains what process is represented in Figure 1 ?

choices.label: New <math alttext="D N A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DNA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> strands are being synthesized in the <math alttext="3 prime" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mo>′</mo></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="5 prime" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mo>′</mo></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> direction from their <math alttext="D N A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DNA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> templates.

New <math alttext="D N A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DNA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> strands are being synthesized in the <math alttext="5 prime" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mo>′</mo></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="3 prime" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mo>′</mo></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> direction from their <math alttext="D N A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DNA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> templates.

A new <math alttext="R N A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>RNA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> strand is being synthesized in the <math alttext="3 prime" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mo>′</mo></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="5 prime" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mo>′</mo></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> end from its <math alttext="D N A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DNA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> template.

Two new <math alttext="R N A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>RNA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> strands are being synthesized in both directions from their <math alttext="D N A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DNA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> templates.

content.answer: New <math alttext="D N A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DNA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> strands are being synthesized in the <math alttext="5 prime" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mo>′</mo></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="3 prime" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mo>′</mo></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> direction from their <math alttext="D N A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DNA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> templates.

skill.text: 2.B: Explain relationships between characteristics of biological models in both theoretical and applied contexts.
